game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time has broken, fragments of eternity are scattered across realms. Players take on the role of a Timekeeper, tasked with collecting and repairing the shattered remnants of chronology.
game.beginning: Players start in the Realm of Dawn, where they meet their mentor, a wise Timekeeper named Aria. She explains the situation and task them with retrieving the first fragment of time from the nearby forest of Eternity's Edge.
game.ending: After gathering all fragments and repairing the fabric of time, players must face the source of the break: the Chronos Dragon. Defeating it restores balance to the realms, but at a cost: one Timekeeper must remain in each realm as its new guardian, while the rest return to their own era. The player's story concludes with them bidding farewell to Aria and departing into their own time.
